long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gartic Cellulart adds the following functions / tools to Gartic Phone:
- Phase Timer: A digital timer in the top-right will count down the number of seconds remaining in the phase
- Reference Images: A file upload box in the bottom right allows you to upload reference images which can be moved about onscreen
- Spotlight: Allows you to download your responses paired with the prompts that inspired them, so you have your performance for that round in one place
- Scry: Shows you who hasn't hit the DONE button yet
- Debug: Controls what messages get printed to the debug console
- Satellite: Unlocks zero or more Red Tools for people without dignity

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated! Just drop a message to Quixz#0033

! Note ! Some functionalities may break if you or another script disable or break the browser's WebSocket

----------------------------------------------------------------
Changelog

--- Minor 1.3.3 --- (28/11/24)
* It's the INTL update! Switched from lang-dependent to lang-independent settings tracking
* In other words: Fixed Timer alignment outside of EN

- Cellulart is going on hiatus while I figure some things out, so there may not be any new updates for a few months.

Thanks for using Cellulart!

--- Patch 1.3.2 --- (6/11/24)
* Stopped Timer from stopping instantly when duration is unknown

--- Patch 1.3.1 --- (14/10/24)
* Added scrollbars and clean up CSS
* Reformatted Geom layout and added explicit config button

--- Major 1.3.0 --- (1/10/24)
* Scry has arrived! Now you know who's slowing down the game :)
* You wouldn't believe how many bugs crawled out of the woodwork when TypeScript flushed out their den 

* webpack and vitest have finally been successfully configured!
* Beta channel installation instructions updated. An expanded changelog is available over there
